__e: Why you working on a Saturday, Joseph, is something wrong?
Are you the woman Joseph is in love with? I... I don't know what you're talking about.
You, Joseph and Brian... Brian most of all.
Take her away, Joseph, and when you are together... you will know there is no need for blood... not for him... not for that.
I hope all goes well for Joseph and yourself.
Same as I loved Jesus and Joseph Smith.
You need to get the message to them they need to keep Joseph Smith alive.
Same as he'd come to Joseph Smith himself to reveal the truth.
